Some error occured, please try again: An error occurred, please try again
Insert your username or email address to: Enter your username or email to recover the associated password
Some error occured while sending email,: There was an error sending the email, please report it to your IT department
Some error occured, please request again: An error has occurred, please request a password reset again. If the problem persists, contact your IT department.
deleteUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete user <1>{{username}}</1>? This operation is not reversible.
adminRoleExplanation: Administrative access allows user management and exploration of the entire registry content regardless of the assigned permissions. On the other hand, pull and push operations require the explicit assignment of a permission, even in the case of administrative users
users-have-rights-on-repo: The following users can perform actions on this repository
delete-tag: Do you really want to delete the "{{tag}}" tag? This operation is not reversible
